description: This restaurant situated in the maze of alleyways that makes up the historic centre of Ceglie boasts tables in a small atmospheric inner courtyard. The restaurant has long been famous for its traditional, regional cuisine and is a must for anyone keen to try typical Puglian specialities. The lamb with roast potatoes is particularly delicious, while the wine list features an interesting selection of regional labels.
